ValidationRule.description: PreSales Sprint-6 Def-2479 PreSales > Req#5543 > January 18 Release
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( PSR_Cost_Business_Group_AA__c<0, PSR_Cost_Business_Group_FN__c<0, PSR_Cost_Business_Group_GS__c<0, PSR_Cost_Business_Group_MN__c<0, PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_IPR__c<0, PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_DNI__c<0, PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_MPC__c<0, PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Services__c<0, PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c<0, PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_Optics__c<0, PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c<0, PSR_Cost_BU_NE_DAaaS__c<0, PSR_Cost_BU_NE_EOP__c<0, PSR_Cost_BU_NE_IoT__c <0, PSR_Sales_Value_Business_Group_AA__c<0, PSR_Sales_Value_Business_Group_FN__c<0, PSR_Sales_Value_Business_Group_GS__c<0, PSR_Sales_Value_Business_Group_MN__c<0, PSR_Sales_Value_Business_Unit_ION_IPR__c<0, PSR_Sales_Value_BU_ION_IPR_DNI__c<0, PSR_Sales_Value_BU_ION_IPR_MPC__c<0, PSR_Sales_Value_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c<0, PSR_Sales_Value_BU_ION_IPR_Services__c<0, PSR_Sales_Value_Business_Unit_ION_Optics__c<0, PSR_Sales_Value_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c<0, PSR_Sales_Value_BU_NE_DAaaS__c<0, PSR_Sales_Value_BU_NE_EOP__c<0, PSR_Sales_Value_BU_NE_IoT__c<0 ), $Profile.Name<>$Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name, $RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Pre_Sales_Risk_Opportunity' )
